statements: DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND game_title = 'Chess';
DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE player_name = 'John Doe' AND game_title = 'Chess';
DELETE FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating < 3 AND date_posted < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_reviews WHERE player_id = 500 AND game_id = 200;
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100 AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_scores WHERE game_id = 50 AND score < 50;
